semantics.label: Decorative only
semantics.description: Enable this option if the image is purely decorative and does not add any information to the content on the page. It will be ignored by screen readers and not given any alternative text.

semantics.label: Animation is essential
semantics.description: Enable this option if the image is animated and playing this animation is essential. Otherwise, the user may have requested reduced motion and needs to actively start the animation.

semantics.label: 替代文字
semantics.description: 必填，當瀏覽器無法載入圖片時會改顯示此文字，同時這也作為視障者語音幫助。

semantics.label: 懸停時文字
semantics.description: 非必填，當使用者懸停在圖像上時額外顯示的文字。
